src:
LAGANIZZA PONEDELJAK TIKET 04: Opušteno ustreli kvotu 17
Treba požuriti, jer ova specijalna MOZZART ponuda važi do 17.00 časova

04 Nov 2019

Sve sem činjenice da MOZZART nudi najbolje kvote u svetu klađenja relativna je pojava. Ako vas je neko danas naljutio, šef primera radi, ili vaša lepša polovina recimo, vi bi večeras mogli tome da doakate, i tako što ćete se poslednji smejati. Naravno, na kvoti većoj od srandarnih 13,44 koliko bi u ovom momentu vredela četiri para LAGANIZZA PONEDELJAK TIKETA 04, da MOZZART sve nije podigao na znatno viši nivo. Sve što treba da učinite, a morate brzo pošto specijalna ponuda važi do 17.00 časova je da odete do vašeg omiljenog uplatnog mesta, ili da tiket pokupite iz svoje fotelje preko mozzartbet.com aplikacije.


17.00: (1,70) SPARTAK M. (3,70) ARSENAL TULA (5,20)



18.00: (2,90) ANKARAGUDŽU (3,35) GAZIHŠEHIR (2,45)



19.00: (5,40) SILKEBORG (4,00) BRONDBI (1,62)



19.30: (1,85) UNIVERZITATEA (3,50) DIN. BUKUREŠT (4,40)


Šta zapravo čekamo? E, pa sve same laganizze, kako to u praksi i jedte kada kažemo da na terenu Spartaka iz Moskve tražimo 1&2+, od Turaka da nas raduju sa GG3+, Brondbi da dođe na dvojku, a Univerzitatea i Dinamo Bukurešt odigraju GG. Nećemo dalje raspisivati priču o tome, jer profesionalci smo, znamo šta je kladilačka reč, pa ćemo se iste držati na kvoti 17,00 sve do 17.00 časova kada se radnja s ovim super tiketom zatvara. Zato DONESITE ODLUKU i pokupite ga na vreme.


* Kvote su podložne promenama
text:
LAGANIZZA MONDAY TICKET 04: Quotient shoots a shot at 17
You should hurry, as this special MOZZART offer is valid until 5pm

04 Nov 2019

All but the fact that MOZZART offers the best odds in the betting world is a relative occurrence. If someone has annoyed you today, the boss of the example is working, or your nicer half, for example, you might be able to find out tonight by laughing at the last one. Of course, at a quota higher than the usual 13.44, which would be worth four pairs at this moment LAGANIZZA MONDAY TICKET 04, had MOZZART not raised everything to a much higher level. All you have to do, and you have to do it quickly, as the special offer is valid until 5pm is to go to your favorite place of payment, or to pick up the ticket from your armchair via mozzartbet.com.


5pm: (1,70) SPARTAK M. (3,70) ARSENAL TULA (5,20)



18.00: (2.90) ANKARAGUJU (3.35) GAZIHESHIR (2.45)



7pm: (5.40) SILKEBORG (4.00) BRONDBY (1.62)



7.30pm: (1.85) UNIVERSITY (3.50) DIN. BUCHAREST (4,40)


What are we really waiting for? Well, all laganizze, how do you eat it when we say that on the Spartacus from Moscow we ask for 1 & 2 +, for the Turks to rejoice us with GG3 +, Brondby to come for two, and Universitatea and Dinamo Bucharest play GG. We will not continue to tell the story about this, because we are professionals, we know what the betting word is, so we will keep it at 17.00 until 17.00 when the shop with this super ticket closes. So BECOME A DECISION and pick it up on time.


* Odds are subject to change
